title: Team battles

author: Oscar Sigas
comment: Loved the game, played for several hours and when I went to log back in, I'd lost all the progress I had made.. seems like other people are having this issue and nothing is being done. So 1 star until the developer starts showing they care.

comment: Every time I try to play the first level on the second planet it just closes out of the app. I've restarted my phone and reinstalled the app like 9 TIMES and it still won't work. Please fix thank you.
title: Would give it a better rating but...

author: Tony Hammond
comment: I was getting into it until it deleted my data and stats after less than one freaking day of playing. Srsly if there's nothing I can do about this then someone needs to get their crap together please bc this seems like a fun game. I already some money to get started too.
title: Lost data

comment: The game keeps crashing randomly every few minutes and its freaking annoying.  Please fix the random crash bug. Apart from that it's an excellent game.  If you fix the crash bug I'll rate it 5 stars

author: Aaron Raymond
comment: it won't save my progress. apparently alot of people have this problem. I don't know why this hasn't been fixed by now. I'll put alot of time in and get really far but when I log out and later get back on most of my progress will be gone. I would spend money on this game if I wasn't afraid that it wouldn't save my progress.

author: Oba Obisesan
comment: It's unfair that you can't buy better scrolls with gold so I have to keep sacrificing suits to upgrade another suit. But the worst thing is if you have 7290 energy and to upgrade martial arts it cost 7359 it will still cost 63 gems to fill the space of 69 energy. :(   I'm disappointed because not everybody can buy that I would rather have a ps4 game over all it's meh could be better.

author: Ken Jones
comment: Can we get the ability to transform and un-transform if we want, after charging our energy to a certain point? Like, give us a charge button and when we charge to that transformation point, we can just transform and if we want to un-transform, we can.

author: Chris Artis
comment: Until the app creators fix the issue of lost progress, don't bother playing the game. It's fun but annoying to have hours of progress loss at random while you're playing. Just save yourself the headache.

author: M J
comment: WAS! Very fun and addictive until my character's power was cut in half. I spent over 2 months playing and reached top 70 and then I have my power cut in half? Thanks for wasting my time.

title: It's fun

author: Donald Wilhite
comment: This is by no means a dragon ball z game, but beating the opponents on the planet's, powering up, getting stronger is certainly a fun concept, Especially when your bored, I'd advise this game to anyone who likes the idea of fighting to become stronger traveling to different planets s nd it has PvP
title: Dragon ball Z Fans

comment: Only one problem. All the CPUs spam the blasts, which Is extremely annoying. Can you fix that? Other than that I love the game.

comment: Was 5 stars, but after i got the planet chef achievement for beating the 5th planet, i turned the game off and when i started it up again my save was gone thjs is the second time this has happened to me and im fuming im so happy i never spent any real money on this game yet because im sure i wouldn't be seeing that again just like my 7 hours I've wasted on this game.... so gutted because it seemed like a really great game
